## Hi üëã, I'm Jhon üá™üá®

Software developer, hardware hacker, and maker with a passion for open source technologies üíª. Co-founder of the FunPython community üêç. From Ecuador üá™üá® to the world üåç.

**Current work:** [BlueSensor](https://github.com/bluesensor) üì°

**Learning:**

- C++ üñ•Ô∏è
- Python üêç
- AI ü§ñ
- Embedded systems ‚öôÔ∏è
- Hardware design üõ†Ô∏è

**Contributions:**

- Articles and IoT projects on FunPythonEC, a technology community working to reduce the technology divide and make knowledge more accessible: [FunPython GitHub](https://github.com/FunPythonEC) üí°

**Expertise:**

- MicroPython üéØ
- Arduino ü§ñ
- Hardware üõ†Ô∏è
- LPWAN üì°
- IoT üí°

**Projects:**

- Industrial IoT üè≠
- Home automation üè°
- Interactive art installations üé®

**Fun fact:** I love coffee ‚òï
